title: Sign Finder
description: A sign inventorying application for companies and cities, allowing users to interactively place signs at their specific locations.

title: Safety Playbook
description: Created at MinneHack 2018, Safety Playbook is a safer way for coaches to evaluate player's risk of injury at a given location on the field.

title: Farm Connect
description: Created at MinneHack 2019, Farm Connect is a virtual logbook for farms to document their progress throughout the growing season.

title: Secure Chat Server
description: Using Beale Cipher, we created a secure chat server to send message to classmates.

title: Assembler/MIPS Simulator
description: Assembly code to machine language, then used the machine language to create a simulated piplelined architecture.

title: GeoDB
description: A full stack application to be used by the Geology department to store rock structure information
